column5: Just checking to see if anyone has launched out of Deception Bay and gone up towards Vaughn Bay? We will be heading up this Sat. (June 27) and wondering how the water level currently is --- and --- of course -- how's the fishing and where are they hiding ??
Did this run late May except from Deception to Two Point. Water was down 3(ish) feet still very ruanble and only a couple areas where water dpet forced you to slow down. Overall, no worries. Cheers
Thanks Frosty --- Anyone else been up there more recently? Hope the water is back up close to "normal" ?
